Description.Text:
Situated in the heart of the city's historic district, the NH Palacio del Duero is close to the River Duero and the romanesque church of Santa Mara de la Horta. The hotel occupies part of the ancient San Juan de Jerusalem convent, built in the 14th- and 15th-century, the first the built was a light factory and an old distillery. The new use given to this architectural group combines elegance and sobriety, with a modern design and equipment to guarantee the most comfortable accommodations in a location which is extraordinarily rich in history and culture.
The NH Palacio del Duero has an outdoor garden at the foot of the ancient church that enables guests to be part of history without leaving the hotel facilities; in addition the NH Palacio del Duero hotel even offers a library space. FREE WIFI in Lobby & Rooms.

Historic monuments in Zamora Cathedral of Zamora - A Romanesque building dating back to the 12th century and surprisingly only took 23 years to build. Castillo de Zamora - A large defensive castle built in the middle ages, and now offers magnificent views of the city. The Church of San Pedro de la Nave - located 12km away from Zamora, this church was founded in the seventh century, rebuilt in the twelfth century, and is one of the three best-preserved Visigothic churches in all of Spain. Due to a reservoir being built on its original site, it was moved stone by stone and then re-erected. City walls - three walled enclosures dating back to the eleventh, twelfth and thirteenth centuries.

4_STAR - TWIN - The spacious rooms are well appointed and equipped with all those details (Room Facilities: Safe, Air Conditioning, Work Desk, Heating, Shower, Bathtub, Hairdryer, Bathroom Amenities, Toilet, Bathroom, Telephone, Radio, Satellite TV, LCD /Plasma /Flat-screen TV, Minibar, Wake Up Service/Alarm Clock Room Size: 25 square metres)that contribuite to a highly satisfactory experience.
4_STAR - PLUS - This spacious room has a balcony with views of Santa Maria de la Horta Church, and includes a bathrobe, slippers and a teakettle. Room Facilities: Safe, Air Conditioning, Suit Press, Work Desk, Heating, Shower, Bathtub, Hairdryer, Bathrobe, Bathroom Amenities, Toilet, Bathroom, Slippers, Pay-Per-View TV, Telephone, Radio, Satellite TV, LCD /Plasma /Flat-screen TV, Tea/Coffee Maker, Minibar, Refrigerator, Wake Up Service/Alarm Clock, Balcony Room Size: 25 - 28 square metres.
